captions.text: This is a very famous trick because it is shocking and a lot of you want to learn this
We are going to do the following
Step on the ball with your dominant Foot
Life the ball at knee height as Minimum and waist height as Maximum
Like this...
that was waist height for example
You can also do it lower at knee height
As we did in previous tricks we are going to use the technique of lifting the ball
with a roll back and hard hit in the bottom
keep in mind the ball has to lift in a straight way
the ball cant go to the sides or forward, has to be straight
You can also perform the lift with your NON Dominant foot
Just roll it and lift it to get it ready for the hook
But with NON dominant foot is pretty hard so i will teach you with the Dominant foot lift up
So we are going to lift the ball to needed height
Now edu will get the ball for me to show you the trick correctly
Once the ball in the air you got to twist your body
and place your Dominant foot right under the ball
At this moment i got visual contact with the ball and can calculate where the ball will land
Ball has to land on your leg part, must not hit your heel or it will bounce
Once you calculated the perfect ball landing
We got to move to part 2 where we cant see the ball, its a blind move
When you feel the ball touches your leg
you got to stretch your leg to the outside
the ball will roll a bit on your leg in direction to your foot
then we just hit the ball forward
So part 1 should be like this
Roll and Lift, then Twist body and place Dominant Foot under the ball
with ball it should be like this
you see, there we place it under ball so its ready for part 2
then we stretch the leg and hit it forward with your foot
keep in mind, when i lift it up i perform a small jump
Placing support foot in good position so my dominant ends right under the ball
So i lift it and jump a bit to place dominant right under the ball
we got to cushion the ball so it wont bounce
so when the ball is falling we need to cushion it good to perform the trick correctly
To cushion it well you need to use the following technique
When you lift it up the ball will get to a point where it starts going down
So you need to place your foot under the ball right when it starts to go down
so it wont get speed and it will prevent the bounce
This is the hardest part, if you cushion it well the ball will have like a grip to your leg
that will let the ball follow your leg as you stretch it
lastly, keep you foot pointing forward so the ball can hit it and go forward
keep that in mind, foot pointing forward
This is a very difficult trick dont try to learn it in 10 minutes
Just practice it little by little and get used to each step of the trick
Warm up good when performing this trick because you do a lot of leg stretching
as you lift the ball your support leg stretches a lot and can injure you if didnt warm up
as you hit the ball you also do stretching
both legs stretch a lot so be carefull and warm up
what i learned by practicing this is the following
you got to the the first part fast to quickly place your dominant under the ball
but part 2 has to be slower
that was my error, wanted to do both parts as quick as possible and couldn't do it correctly
part 2, can be don slower at medium sleep
ball will follow your leg if its well cushioned
another thing that can happen is to hit it really high or really low
you just got to practice that
try performing all the step correctly
but body postion can help
if you place it looking down or looking up it will change direction of the ball
So body has to be stable as well
if you really want to do this trick you got to practice
its not just grabbing a ball for 2 days and if didn't just giving up
you got to practice constantly and continuously, those who practice are the once who can do it !
i hope you enjoyed the tutorial you have been asking for months for this tutorial
and finally we got it on Football Tricks Online
Dont forget to hit the LIKE button because it helps a lot !
you can also Subscribe to know when we upload new videos
You can follow us in social networks that will appear in video or description
and a big thanks to Edu that helped us do better examples for this video
See you next time !

title: AKKA 3000 Tutorial - Trucos de Futbol Sala & jugadas de futbol Street Football Skills
